name: Jaipur
description: The Pink City of India, known for its rich history and palaces.

name: Goa
description: A coastal paradise famous for its beaches and nightlife.

name: Delhi
description: Delhi, officially the National Capital Territory (NCT) of Delhi, is a sprawling metropolis in northern India that serves as the nation's capital. It is a city steeped in history, having been built and destroyed multiple times and ruled by various empires, including the Mauryas, Mughals, and British. Today, it is a major political, commercial, and cultural hub that reflects a mix of traditional and modern influences.
